sys_script_include.description:
Tools to support (scoped) app development Functions are only available for global scope and specific scopes defined in the system properties "now.globaltools.access_from_scope" or "now.globaltools.access_from_scope_custom" for security reasons. From Vancouver release onwards you can use GlideJsonPathAPI instead of getValue function. https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/vancouver-api-reference/page/app-store/dev_portal/API_reference/GlideJsonPath/concept/GlideJsonPathAPI.html
If your script is in ECMA 6 mode use Object.assign instead of ObjectAssign function.
sys_script_include.name: GlobalToolsObject
